epics.title: Enterprise Authentication and Access Management
epics.summary: Implement enterprise-grade authentication and role-based access control with tenant isolation
epics.description: Develop a secure login system integrated with enterprise identity providers using SAML, OAuth2.0, or OpenID Connect protocols. Implement role-based access control (RBAC) to manage user permissions based on organizational roles. Ensure strong tenant isolation, session management, and secure data boundaries to protect information across different organizations and user groups.

epics.title: Cloud Account Onboarding and Provider Integration
epics.summary: Enable the secure onboarding of multi-cloud accounts and integration with provider APIs
epics.description: Create workflows to allow users to onboard and authenticate their cloud accounts across AWS, Azure, GCP, and IBM Cloud. Integrate with each cloud providerâ€™s API layer to manage service credentials, test connectivity, and establish a trusted communication channel. Implement secure storage and encryption for API credentials, tokens, and secrets to ensure compliance and data protection.

epics.title: Automated Multi-Cloud Resource Discovery and Normalization
epics.summary: Implement continuous resource discovery and normalization across multiple cloud environments
epics.description: Develop an automated discovery engine that interacts with provider APIs to identify all resources under onboarded accounts. Normalize resource data into a unified schema that standardizes category, type, region, cost, and ownership information. Implement delta-based synchronization and error handling to maintain accurate and always up-to-date resource inventories.

epics.title: Unified Dashboard and Visualization Layer
epics.summary: Provide a single-pane dashboard showing cloud resource inventory, cost, security, and compliance insights
epics.description: Design and build a personalized, interactive dashboard that aggregates key insights from all connected cloud accounts. Present data related to cost, resource inventory, security, and compliance in visually rich and dynamic charts. Enable searchable and filterable views based on user roles, accounts, providers, or regions to facilitate efficient operational decision-making.

epics.title: Cost Management and Optimization Insights
epics.summary: Develop cost analytics and optimization capabilities across multi-cloud environments
epics.description: Integrate with billing APIs and usage data sources from each cloud provider to consolidate spend analytics. Build models for cost anomaly detection, identify idle or underutilized resources, and recommend optimization opportunities. Provide visual cost breakdowns and forecasting tools for proactive budget management and financial governance.

epics.title: Security Posture and Compliance Evaluation
epics.summary: Create a rule-based assessment engine for cloud security and compliance posture
epics.description: Implement a continuous assessment engine that evaluates configurations and operations against security baselines and compliance frameworks such as CIS, NIST, and ISO 27001. Generate findings with severity classifications and remediation recommendations. Provide visibility into violations, impacted resources, and compliance scoring to maintain strong governance and security hygiene.

epics.title: Governance Automation and Workflow Integration
epics.summary: Enable automated policy enforcement and workflow integration with CI/CD and IaC tools
epics.description: Develop automation workflows to trigger policy enforcement, environment provisioning, tagging compliance, or remediation tasks. Integrate with CI/CD pipelines such as Jenkins, Azure DevOps, and GitLab, as well as Infrastructure-as-Code tools like Terraform and Ansible. Include approval workflows, rollback mechanisms, and audit tracking to ensure secure and accountable automation operations.

epics.title: Real-Time Alerts and Notifications
epics.summary: Implement event-driven alerts and notification mechanisms for cost, security, and compliance anomalies
epics.description: Develop an alerting framework that monitors cloud environments for critical conditions such as cost spikes, policy breaches, or security violations. Enable configurable thresholds, routing options, and multi-channel delivery including email, chat, and webhooks. Support escalation workflows, alert deduplication, and correlation for efficient incident management and response.

epics.title: Audit Logging and Activity History
epics.summary: Maintain a complete, immutable record of user actions and system events
epics.description: Implement comprehensive activity tracking and audit logging across both user-initiated and automated operations. Capture detailed metadata such as user identity, timestamps, resource changes, and triggered workflows. Store logs securely with encryption, support retention policies, and enable full traceability through query and export capabilities for compliance reporting.

epics.title: Scalability, Performance, and Reliability Enhancements
epics.summary: Ensure platform scalability, performance optimization, and high availability at enterprise scale
epics.description: Architect the system for horizontal scalability, enabling support for a growing number of users, cloud accounts, and data volumes. Implement caching, distributed processing, and load balancing strategies to enhance performance. Build failover, backup, and disaster recovery mechanisms to ensure system resilience, reliability, and continuous uptime in production environments.

user_stories.title: Integrate with Enterprise Identity Providers
user_stories.description: As a security engineer, I want to integrate with enterprise identity providers (e.g., SAML, OAuth, LDAP), so that users can securely authenticate using their enterprise credentials.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Must support SAML, OAuth, LDAP integrations; Ensure secure data handling.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Integration with SAML, OAuth, LDAP verified in test environment; Users authenticate using enterprise credentials.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a configured identity provider, When a user attempts to authenticate, Then the system validates credentials and grants access according to RBAC rules.

user_stories.title: Implement Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
user_stories.description: As a system administrator, I want to implement role-based access control (RBAC), so that users can only access resources based on their roles and permissions.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Define roles and permissions; Ensure only authorized access to resources.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Roles and permissions set up; Users restricted to role-permitted actions.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user with a specific role, When the user tries to access a resource, Then the system grants or denies access based on assigned permissions.

user_stories.title: Implement Tenant Isolation
user_stories.description: As a system architect, I want to implement tenant isolation, so that user data is securely segregated in a multi-tenant environment.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Ensure data isolation per tenant; Prevent cross-tenant data access.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Data segregated per tenant; Verified and tested for isolation compliance.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a multi-tenant system, When a user from tenant A accesses the system, Then the user should only see and interact with tenant A's data.

user_stories.title: Design Onboarding Workflows for Cloud Providers
user_stories.description: As a cloud engineer, I want to design onboarding workflows for AWS, Azure, GCP, and IBM Cloud, so that new accounts can be integrated smoothly.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Onboarding workflows designed and tested for AWS, Azure, GCP, and IBM Cloud.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a new cloud account, When an onboarding process is initiated, Then the system stores credentials securely and validates permissions.

user_stories.title: Establish API Integration with Cloud Providers
user_stories.description: As a software integrator, I want to establish reliable API integration with supported cloud providers, so that seamless connectivity is ensured.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Support APIs for AWS, Azure, GCP, IBM Cloud; Handle integration errors gracefully.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: API integrations established and validated; Error handling implemented.
user_stories.test_cases: Given API credentials, When connecting to a cloud provider, Then the system ensures a reliable connection and handles errors gracefully.

user_stories.title: Develop Automated Discovery Mechanisms
user_stories.description: As a cloud operations manager, I want to develop automated discovery mechanisms, so that cloud resources are fetched and updated periodically.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Use cloud APIs; Ensure resiliency during API failures; Sync periodically.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Automated discovery implemented for multiple providers; Periodic sync and delta updates verified.
user_stories.test_cases: Given configured API credentials, When discovery is triggered, Then resources are fetched, updated, and resiliency to API failures is ensured.

user_stories.title: Normalize Discovered Data
user_stories.description: As a data architect, I want to normalize discovered cloud resource data, so that it conforms to a common schema for unified reporting.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Normalize data from multiple cloud providers; Ensure data consistency.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Cloud resource data normalized; Unified schema established.
user_stories.test_cases: Given discovered data, When normalization is applied, Then the data conforms to the common unified schema.

user_stories.title: Develop Frontend Dashboard
user_stories.description: As a product manager, I want to develop a frontend dashboard that presents cloud resources, costs, security posture, and compliance metrics, so that users have a unified view of their cloud environments.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Provide role-based views; Include filtering, search, and visualization widgets.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Dashboard developed with interactive widgets; Views tailored by user roles.
user_stories.test_cases: Given specific user roles, When accessing the dashboard, Then users see tailored views of cloud data and can interact with widgets.

user_stories.title: Implement Drill-Down Capabilities
user_stories.description: As a data analyst, I want to implement drill-down capabilities for the dashboard, so that users can explore data in detail by cloud, region, or service.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Support data exploration by different dimensions; Ensure responsive performance.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the dashboard, When a user drills down by cloud, region, or service, Then detailed data is presented without performance degradation.

architecture_generation.description: Multi-cloud self-service platform integrating resources from various cloud providers with comprehensive management features including enterprise authentication, real-time updates, CI/CD integration, role-based access control, and compliance requirements.
